plot: Evan, a bounty hunter, meets her match in the handsome con she's tracking. Posing as a hitchhiker, she catches his eye. But he'll not give up without a fight so they fight and make love until they are exhausted and inextricably linked.
title: "Red Shoe Diaries" The Bounty Hunter
plot_es: Evan, a bounty hunter, meets her match in the handsome con she's tracking. Posing as a hitchhiker, she catches his eye. But he'll not give up without a fight so they fight and make love until they are exhausted and inextricably linked.
plot_en: Evan, a bounty hunter, meets her match in the handsome con she's tracking. Posing as a hitchhiker, she catches his eye. But he'll not give up without a fight so they fight and make love until they are exhausted and inextricably linked.
